attributes.action: Turn down the proposal for a Vodafone mast in Bayswater Road, New Brighton, Wallasey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My husband started suffering Nocturnal Seizures since the mast at the rear of our property (outside Windsors) was 'upgraded' and made stronger last year.  We are very worried about further detrimental effects involving possible brain injury to him and to others in the vicinity, including the many visitors who come to New Brighton in their leisure time, should this new proposal go ahead. 
The local council have refused planning permission for this mast site at the first hearing, but Vodafone have put in an appeal to the Planning Inspectorate.
